childElements.name: HR_Provide_Signature
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "controlWidth" : 12.0, "label" : "Please provide your signature", "text" : "Please provide your signature", "show" : null, "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }

childElements.name: HRSA_Background
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12.0, "label" : "In accordance with section 54 of the Public Service Employment Act (PSEA) the following persons must subscribe and sign an oath or affirmation as a condition of employment before the start date or, at the latest, during the first day of work:
\n
  • Any person being appointed from outside the public service
    • \n
  • Every person appointed or deployed from outside the public service in which the Public Service Commission has exclusive authority to make appointments
    • \n
  • All students (including initial employment and re-employment following a break in service of a workday or more).

\nYou must subscribe the Oath or Solemn Affirmation below out loud. You must also identify the name of the person (direct supervisor or designated employee) who administered it to you.", "text" : "In accordance with section 54 of the Public Service Employment Act (PSEA) the following persons must subscribe and sign an oath or affirmation as a condition of employment before the start date or, at the latest, during the first day of work:

  • Any person being appointed from outside the public service

  • Every person appointed or deployed from outside the public service in which the Public Service Commission has exclusive authority to make appointments

  • All students (including initial employment and re-employment following a break in service of a workday or more).


You must subscribe the Oath or Solemn Affirmation below out loud. You must also identify the name of the person (direct supervisor or designated employee) who administered it to you.", "show" : null, "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }

childElements.name: HRSA_Name_of_the_person_administering_the_O
HRSA_OathText
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "controlWidth" : 12.0, "label" : "Swear (or solemnly affirm) that I will faithfully and honestly fulfill the duties that devolve on me by reason of my employment in the public service of Canada and that I will not, without due authority, disclose or make known any matter that comes to my knowledge by reason of such employment. (If you are subscribing under Oath, also say \"So help me God\" o other name of deity).", "text" : "Swear (or solemnly affirm) that I will faithfully and honestly fulfill the duties that devolve on me by reason of my employment in the public service of Canada and that I will not, without due authority, disclose or make known any matter that comes to my knowledge by reason of such employment. (If you are subscribing under Oath, also say \"So help me God\" o other name of deity).", "show" : null, "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }
